description: Your proof of immortality. You invested your whole life on a countless battles with immensive power and all of your experiences has paid off until now. The living nightmare of the dark days, is now a scavenger of the Cataclysm.
name: Vampire
Hemomancer
description: Hemomancers tend to be resourceful in their environment, manipulating the life force of one's self and seize other's to bind for their own will.
